title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or translations and to score the response.

One point is awarded for each correctly answered simple subquestion. One point is awarded for each correctly answered part (A or B) of a complex subquestion.

Note: Some answers provided below may have acceptable variants. Teachers should use their discretion in accepting alternative answers.
descriptions:
The response does not accurately include any of the answers below.

· Subquestion 1 (one point)

o the Elysian Fields, fields of the blessed/joy

· Subquestion 2 [A] (one point)

o with love of coming fame/reputation/glory

· Subquestion 2 [B] (one point)

o present

· Subquestion 3 (one point)

o (about) to be waged, must/should/needed to be waged

· Subquestion 4 (one point)

o spondee dactyl dactyl spondee dactyl spondee

o Lauren- | -tesque do- | -cet popu- | -los ur- | -bemque La- | -tini

o The line must be completely correct in its scansion. Copying of the Latin need not be perfect.

o The final foot may be rendered as a spondee, or as a long-short, or as a long-anceps (X).

o The response may have long and short marks over the Latin syllables or have the names of each metrical unit written out. If the response offers both styles of scansion and they do not match, the better version will count.

· Subquestion 5 (one point)

o the Laurentian people; the city of Latinus/the Latins

o what labor to avoid; what labor to endure and how

· Subquestion 6 (one point)

o a shield
